definition[0]: hardscrabble land has poor soil and will not produce good crops of food, and sometimes not any food at all
example[0]: I remembered it being green and humid, nothing like this hardscrabble land.
definition[1]: poor, and working on land that does not produce enough food to eat or crops to sell
example[1]: The town is also home to hardscrabble residents who have to eat at the soup kitchen.
